verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H6030"\w* me when I \w call|strong="H7121"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*: thou hast \w enlarged|strong="H7337"\w* me \add when I was\add* in \w distress|strong="H6862"\w*; have \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* upon me, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*.\f + \fr 4.1 \ft chief…: or, overseer\f*\f + \fr 4.1 \ft have…: or, be gracious unto me\f*

O ye \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, how \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \add will ye turn\add* my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* into \w shame|strong="H3639"\w*? \add how long\add* will ye \w love|strong="H0157"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7385"\w*, \add and\add* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* after \w leasing|strong="H3577"\w*? \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

But \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath set \w apart|strong="H6395"\w* him that is \w godly|strong="H2623"\w* for himself: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* when I \w call|strong="H7121"\w* unto him.

Stand in \w awe|strong="H7264"\w*, and \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* not: \w commune|strong="H0559"\w* with your own \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* upon your \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*, and be \w still|strong="H1826"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
\w Offer|strong="H2076"\w* the \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and put your \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\add There be\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* that \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Who will \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* us \add any\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*? \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, lift thou \w up|strong="H5375"\w* the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of thy \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* upon us.

Thou hast \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* in my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, more than in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \add that\add* their \w corn|strong="H1715"\w* and their \w wine|strong="H8492"\w* \w increased|strong="H7231"\w*.

I will \w both|strong="H3162"\w* lay me \w down|strong="H7901"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, and \w sleep|strong="H3462"\w*: for thou, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w only|strong="H0910"\w* makest me \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w safety|strong="H0983"\w*.
